items.reviewContent: good to have one,  no damage, received little late,  seller should clarify that sno on product and sno on warranty card are not same, also seller stamp not available on warranty card
items.itemTitle: Dawlance Refrigerator 9178 Wide Body / M-Chrome Metallic Silver / 13 CFT / 12.12 Limited Edition / Large Freezer/ 12 Years Brand Warranty

replies.reviewContent: Dear Customer, we are glad that you are satisfied with the product. We would like to inform you that we have sent you the seller e-invoice to your registered email address. You can claim your warranty with that invoice as you have bought it from an official flagship store so don't worry about a blank or no warranty card. You can contact us on chat for further assistance.

items.reviewContent:
Really satisfied with the product and the overall experience thus far.
Product is exactly the same as it was ordered and the finishing is actually better than what I was expecting.
The delivery was handled by Daraz Express and the service provided from their end was exceptional and most importantly, on time as committed.
Highly recommended!
items.itemTitle: Dawlance Refrigerator 9178 Wide Body / M-Chrome Metallic Silver / 13 CFT / 12.12 Limited Edition / Large Freezer/ 12 Years Brand Warranty

replies.reviewContent: Dear Customer, we sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. It is not every day that we receive feedback as detailed and thoughtful as yours. Your comment has given us valuable insight into the services that we are providing. Thanks for choosing Dawlance.

items.reviewContent: The printed price is Rs 68,599/- while on sale I bought it for Rs 75,495 (using vouchers) Warranty date is also till Jan 24, just for 8 months. delivery partner leopard courier is also one of the worst courier companies, overall not a good experience
items.itemTitle: Dawlance Refrigerator 9178 Wide Body / M-Chrome Metallic Silver / 13 CFT / 12.12 Limited Edition / Large Freezer/ 12 Years Brand Warranty

replies.reviewContent: Dear Customer, we are so sorry about the product price which hasn't meet your expectations, but we hope that you are satisfied with our product. We would like to inform you that prices fluctuates due to dollar rate as our all parts are imported and we are unable to alter the price once printed according to Pakistan rules and regulations. Hope you got our point. We assure you that you have got the best product. You can contact us on chat if you have any issue in our product and services.

items.reviewContent: Very good product of dawlance exclusively available on daraz. Yes M Chrome 9178 can only be bought from daraz. Seller is not any else but DAWALNACE itself so we trusted more than usual. Well packed timely arrival in a very remote area of Sindh. Seller daraz as well as courier helped us all the way as we needee. Size of refrigerator is exactly same as claimed in specifications &  Q/A. Highly recommended

replies.reviewContent: Dear Customer, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are thrilled that you loved your experience; our staff will definitely be happy to read what you wrote.
